summary: An ordinance vacating portions of Market Street, together with portions of certain other streets, avenues and alleys, as platted in Brygger's 1st Home Addition to the City of Ballard and in Brygger's 2nd Home Addition to the City of Ballard, as recorded in Volume 10, Plats of King County, at pages 92 and 94, on the petition of Anna S. Brygger.
